name: Pong (itch) (rishene)
description:
This is a basic Pong game that I have created for my university's Game Development & Esports Club during my time as Club Vice President. It was used as a showcase on club day.

The game was made in a few hours, and I will not come back to polish it any time soon, so please excuse the few bugs.

The graphics were imported from https://opengameart.org/content/pong-graphics

All the code was made by me from scratch
